posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. How to use Hexo and deploy to GitHub PagesWhat is GitHub Pages?GitHub Pages is a static site hosting service designed to host your personal, organization, or project pages directly from a GitHub repository. More info: GitHub Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
